issue.title: [R] Set -rpath using pkg-config when building
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3314](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3314). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is hard-coded in ARROW-3282

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3314?focusedCommentId=16848285) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
I think this is resolved. `-rpath` is no longer hard-coded, and https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5332 added guidance for addressing possible challenges with rpath.
